TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, after recognizing the "true" fabric of space and time you start immediatly morphing to a single supercontious immortal being able to travel any place at any time without moving yourself observable for other creatures. Being bored about the repeating boredom of the universe you rediscover the interesting sides of being a mortal Human.

I wish i could stop thinking about a woman who crosses my mind every ... day since way too many years for absolutely no explicable reason or sense.

Granted. Instead, a really expensive toaster crosses your mind every ... day for no explicable reason or sense, making you hungry and envious of the owners of said toaster.

I wish I could actually do something today other than sniffle and refresh forum pages.
Granted, you join my fighter plane tournament. I wish more people joined my tournament...

Granted. Where do I sign up? [Yes that's a corruption]

I wish I wasn't a corruption.

Granted, you see the signup link here.http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130238-Top-Gun-AI-The-Official-Tournament-Thread/page37

I wish that Xannari joined the tournament.

Granted. I have no idea how to build an optimal fighter.

I wish my compact designs actually worked.

Granted, but they have to have less than 400 fuel.

I wish that Xan knew that the more wings you clip, the better the plane.

Edited August 14, 2015 by Alphasus

Granted. Clipping more wings causes the plane to explode catastrophically once hit. Not only does Xan lose the match, but the computer of the person hosting the fight (I'd assume that would be you, but I'm not sure) crashes, then explodes. The entire tournament is cancelled.

I wish people would come and watch the livestream which I'm about to start.

Granted, they are all hungry bears, and they eat you.

I wish wish wish wish wish wish

Granted but you can't wish wish.

I wish for...

Granted, but you get ,,,

I wish for endless bacon rain for all eternity complete with steak, pizza, chili, and MORE BACON!

Granted. Everyone looks to the sky and opens their mouths. The entire non-vegetarian human population chokes to death (Though I must admit it would be a good way to die).

I wish that an offline person grants my wish.

Granted. I will be offline eventually, so that is when your wish will be granted. I bet this is not what you had in mind.

I wish someone would clear their mailbox.

granted, but its not me

I wish i could eat anything

Granted, but you choke on a bone.

I wish xannari would return to the rp.

Granted, (s)he returns to the wrong rp.

I wish I could buy my friend a good computer.

Granted. You get the money for it by selling your computer.

I wish my day hadn't involved sniffling and spiders.

Granted. Your night is full of it.

I wish for Sampa again.

You have me, but we,have a big fight(please, let's not really have one)

I wish there was some more support for the War of Insanity rp.

Granted But its sucks more than what it currently is.

I WISH FOR IT TO BE AUGUST 24TH

Granted. August 24th, 1944.. The era of WWII.

I wish KSP was less bugged.

Granted. Because everything in KSP can produce bugs, there is nothing left.

I wish I had a hamburger.

Granted. But someboddy accidentally switched ham and burger so you have a piece of bread inside 2 pieces of meat...

I wish I could build a space elevator from my garden

Edited August 15, 2015 by Thomassino

Granted, but it never stops, and you die after you run out of oxygen.

I wish to be on Good Mythical morning.

Granted but the fire breathing chicken burns you in the intro.

I wish for a pet baby Kraken.
